participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Sensitive and compassionate, deeply cares about animals and the environment.
participant_1.background: i am an animal activist. the holidays make me depressed. my age is too old to say. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves to create stories with her dolls.
participant_2.background: i like to play with my dolls. my best friend lives next door. i have a pet turtle. i'm four.
